item.title: Arch Linux Installation Guide
item.description: Arch installation Get arch Download Arch Linux from https://archlinux.org/download/ and follow guide from https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Installation_guide Before boot (OPTIONAL) You can press e to edit install configuration like: # If you think the screen is too small. nomodset video=800x450 Setting font (OPTIONAL) If you think the font is too small and hard to look, you can change font for a more comfortable look. setfont /usr/share/kbd/consolefonts/LatGrkCyr-12x12.gz Configure key (OPTIONAL) touch keys.conf #-------edit--------# keycode 1 = Caps_Lock keycode 58 = Escape #----end of edit-----# loadkeys keys.
